SELECT ci.id, c.NAME, ui.user_id, ui.realName, cg.name college , sci.course_info_id ciid FROM course_info ci LEFT JOIN course c ON ci.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ci.user_id = ui.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT course_info_id FROM student_course_info WHERE user_id = #{id} ) sci ON ci.id = sci.course_info_id left join college cg on ui.college_id = cg.id WHERE c.ismust =0 order by ci.id LIMIT #{start}, #{length}
SELECT count(c.id) count FROM course c WHERE c.ismust=0

SELECT sci.course_info_id couresInfoId, ui.user_id userId, ui.number, ui.realName, cg.name college FROM student_course_info sci LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON sci.user_id = ui.user_id LEFT JOIN course_info ci ON sci.course_info_id = ci.id left join college cg on ui.college_id = cg.id WHERE unix_timestamp( time ) BETWEEN unix_timestamp( #{start} ) AND unix_timestamp( NOW( ) ) AND ci.user_id = #{id}
